title: Does anyone else think the Platinum icon looks like Silver?
body:
As title says, like the gold one is so cool and bright and really shows off 'gold' and the platinum icon just looks like silver with a green dot in the middle :/
I wish It stood out more

replies.body: Plat looks -exactly- like the Silver one. I guess given the fact Plat is a lot like silver but with entitlement, it's sorta deserving, but still. lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Zair Umbras,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=z23EUrvV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-15T06:40:25.972+0000)
>
> Plat looks -exactly- like the Silver one. I guess given the fact Plat is a lot like silver but with entitlement, it's sorta deserving, but still. lol.

I just checked the Diamond one out and it looks exactly the same too. I get what youre saying haha but they really should be unique
